ONE.graphic_title: Fifty poorest counties in the U.S.
ONE.prose: This radial bar chart shows the 50 counties in the U.S., including Puerto Rico, with the highest percentage of residents living below the poverty line in 2016. All but one, Oglala Lakota County, South Dakota, is in Puerto Rico.
ONE.source: U.S. Census Bureau 2016 American Community Survey 5-year estimates
